description: Try our easy to follow Roast Beetroot & Carrots recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Beetroot,Peanut free
name: Roast Beetroot & Carrots Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place beetroot wedges in a single layer on a shallow baking pan. Drizzle with 1 tbs of the oil and toss to coat. Roast for 20 minutes.
Add carrots and cook for 20-30 minutes until carrots are just tender.
Meanwhile, whisk remaining oil, lemon juice, paprika and garlic together. Pour over vegetables and toss well. Return to oven for 5 minutes.
Transfer to a serving bowl and garnish with mint.
